thread.title: "Great experience!" Jamie O'Hara reunites with dad after CBB shock secret eviction
thread.title_full: "Great experience!" Jamie O'Hara reunites with dad after CBB shock secret eviction

author: Lara Martin
title: "Great experience!" Jamie O'Hara reunites with dad after CBB shock secret eviction
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jamie O’Hara has been reunited with his dad following his shock eviction from Celebrity Big Brother this evening. 
The former footballer was given the boot in a secret eviction on Monday night, and led out of the house in handcuffs as the judge and jury task reached a climax. 
Returning to social media afterwards, Jamie shared a photo of himself and his father after the eviction. 
“Got my dad to break me out of jail,” he quipped. 
“So happy to see him I tried not to cry this time, love to everyone.” Jamie was thrilled to be reunited with his dad (Photo: Twitter/Jamie O'Hara) Jamie was in tears earlier in the series when his dad phoned him during a task but he couldn't answer (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
